roleset.name: reside, linger
roleset.note: DWELL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dwell' based on sentences in wsj. (from dwell.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: as 'linger'
example.text: I know I-1 do not have [*-1] to dwell here on the absurdity of that contention.
example.arg: on the absurdity of that contention

example.name: as 'reside'
example.text: Or the mode of love to this fragment by a recent poet: ``Know ye, fair folk who [*T*-1] dwell on earth Or shall hereafter come to birth, That here, with dust upon his eyes, Iraj, the sweet-tongued singer, lies.

example.name: 'reside' again, awkward syntax
example.text: It consists of fragmentary personal revelations, such as ``The Spark'': ``There is a spark [0] [*T*-1]dwells deep within my soul.
